CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 22, 1945, p. 21, reads: "Courier Cited - Mrs. Daisy Lampkin, vice president of The Pittsburgh Courier, and Ira F. Lewis, president of The Courier, receive a War Bond citation on behalf of the newspaper, presented by Mrs. Neil Hunter, promotion specialist of the War Finance Committee. The Courier subscribed for more than ten per cent bond purchases throughout the war and was among the leaders in purchase of bonds among newspapers in Western Pennsylvania - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Daisy Lampkin, and Ira F. Lewis accepting War Bond citation from Mrs. Neil Hunter, in Pittsburgh Courier Newspaper office
